item.title: About
item.description:
Vision

This project was born out of a vision and desire to see Christian believers all over the world have access to search the sermons of William Branham in their own language. Very good tools and translations exist for English speakers but are more limited for those that speak other languages. The Message Hub platform was developed to support translation efforts worldwide, and it has been a great success. The next natural progression is developing advanced tools that take advantage of this platform and all the hard work that has gone into it and the translations. There are in existence mobile apps that utilize the Message Hub that support iOS and Android devices. While these app are very convenient and useful, those apps and mobile devices in general are by design more limited than full PC desktop and laptop computers. This project is aimed at fulfilling that need.

item.title: Download
item.description:
Open Message View 2.0 is still in the testing phase. To get started click one of the download links below. The older version 1.0 that is compatible with Windows 7/8 is also linked below.

The only difference between the installers is the infobases that are included and the default language that is selected.

If you have questions, please email us at info@openwordsoftware.com.

Open Message View 2.0 Beta (Windows 10/11 & Mac OS)

System Requirements

  • Windows 11 and Windows 10 (version 1809 or higher), or Mac OSX 11 or higher
  • OpenMessageView uses your hard drive to store infobase files that are included in the installer and any that you might download. Because of this, actual disk space requirements will depend on the number of infobases you install. However, the largest infobases are still less than 100MB each

English Beta

Warning! Beta software is intended for testing and feedback purposes only. It is still under development and has not undergone thorough testing. This means it may contain bugs, glitches, and unfinished features.

Open Message View 1.0 (Windows 7/8)

System Requirements

  • Windows 11, Windows 10 (version 1607 “Anniversary Update” or newer), or Windows 8.1, or Windows 7 SP1 with Platform Update
  • OpenMessageView depends on Microsoft’s .NET Framework 4.7.2 or greater, which is automatically installed if it isn’t already on the system.

Minimum Machine Requirements

  • 1GHz processor (dual-core recommended)
  • 1GB of RAM
  • OpenMessageView uses your hard drive to store infobase files that are included in the installer and any that you might download. Because of this, actual disk space requirements will depend on the number of infobases you install. However, the largest infobases are still less than 100MB each
